feed.title: Personal blog
feed.subtitle: Could be about anything, but mainly on physics

entry.title: Proofreading in Vim
entry.summary: I have spent a lot of time in Vim writing in LaTex and some Markdown. Functionalities like spell checking are quite important, especially I mostly write stuff in my non-native languages. This article covers, hopefully, every aspect of proofreading LaTex and Markdown in Vim. Vim spell checking Vim itself has already a fully functioning spell checker, see :h spell for more details. Basically on...

entry.title: Advanced Theoretical Particle Physics SS2020
entry.summary: Here you can find some study material for Advanced Theoretical Particle Physics in SS2020 offered by Prof. Manuel Drees at University Bonn. script H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 H7 H8 H9 H10 All these are also hosted in GitHub repo.

entry.title: Advanced Quantum Field Theory WS2019/2020
entry.summary: You can find study material for Advanced Quantum Field Theory in WS2019/2020 at University Bonn. For students at Uni Bonn, eCampus link is this. script H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 H7 H8 H9 H10 H11 H12 H13 H14 All these files can be found in repo.

entry.title: Advanced Quantum Theory WS2018/2019
entry.summary: Here you can find my notes and assignment solutions to Advanced Quantum Theory SS2019 taught by Prof. Monien at University Bonn. The exercise sheets can be found on his website or here. I cannot garuantee the correctness of all content, but I have tried my best to correct errors and typos. PDF files and LaTex code can be found on GitHub. notes link 2...

entry.title: Quantum Field Theory SS2019
entry.summary: Here you can find my notes and solutions to assignments in Quantum Field Theory SS2019 at Bonn University taught by PD Dr.Kubis and Dr. Andreas Wirzba. Exercise sheets and etc can be found in eCampus. I cannot garuantee the correctness of all content, but I have tried my best to correct errors and typos.
